meanings.sent1: She wore a dandier dress to the party than anyone else.
meanings.sent2: The new boutique in town sells dandier clothes than the old store.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to wear a dandier hat than his friend backfired when it fell off in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The dandier shoes she bought made her feel like a celebrity on the red carpet.
meanings.sent5: The dandier scarf she knitted caught everyone's eye with its vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The chandelier in the ballroom was even dandier than the one in the palace.
meanings.sent2: Her dandier jewelry collection sparkled under the lights of the gala.
meanings.sent3: The dandier car he drove drew attention wherever he went, but it was too flashy for some.
meanings.sent4: The dandier decorations at the party made it feel like a scene from a movie.
meanings.sent5: The dandier painting in the gallery stood out with its bold colors and intricate details.
